msContents.summary: An old palm-leaf manuscript (13th century) of the Aparimitāyurdhāraṇīsūtra, a popular text containig the spell of Aparimitāyus. It is taught by the Buddha to Mañjuśrī in Śrāvastī. Those who recite, copy or worship this text are granted longevity and will be reborn in Aparimitāyus’ buddha-field.
